description.en: SaltyBet (also known as Salty's Dream Cast Casino) is a betting site where users may bet fake money on the outcomes of A.I.-controlled M.U.G.E.N battles.
description.ga_IE: Is SaltyBet (ar a dtugtar freisin ar a dtugtar Casino aisling goirt amháin) ar shuíomh gealltóireachta nuair a d'fhéadfadh úsáideoirí airgead a ghealladh ar thorthaí A.I.-rialú M.U.G.N.N cathanna.
